title: Long Live Judge Judy: A Conversation with Colin
description:
Colin loves Judy Judy. Let him tell you why.

Today's topic was submitted by @Jushin on Twitter. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below. 

Here's how Judge Judy pays people on the show: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judge_Judy#Structure

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Sean for filming. 

Special thanks to Patxi's Pizza for feeding us while filming. Next time you're in San Francisco, eat at Patxi's -- http://patxispizza.com/.
